channel.title: Searching for a partner || Linux VPS Ready || Make $$$
channel.description:
Hello MoparScape Users, I' understand that I'm a new member here and might not be that trusted - but I thought it was worth posting here as a lot of people might be interested. I'll introduce myself, my name is Lewis, I'm 18 and from the UK. I'm somewhat experienced with JAVA (I can edit servers, I used to be a contributor on RSCA - RuneScape Botting Forum, which was a rank that was given to certain members for making HQ Java Scripts for the bot) - but am much better with HTML/PHP/MySQL.
I'm searching for someone that is interested in starting a RuneScape Private Server with me (We'll both be owners). I have a linux VPS which has been pre-paid for the next 2 and a half months - so if you have a server, we can literally upload the files and start running the vps - it'll be online 24/7 and will probably handle 50+ players easily.
I own https://efyu.net (http://efyu.net/proof.txt) which lets users complete surveys in return for points (EFYU has over 700 members). I would be interested in setting up a page for the server, where users can complete surveys for ingame cash, items, ranks, etc.. Each time a user completes a survey, we get anywhere from $1-30 depending on the survey they complete, via PayPal at the end of the month (Check adworkmedia.com - it's very trusted, ranked #1 on affpaying.com - we're guaranteed to be paid).
I am looking for someone who can code the server - and preferably already has a server that we can start with asap.
Professionalism - I'm looking for someone VERY professional. I will be monetizing the server and everything will be split 50/50 - (minus hosting costs), by allowing users to donate via paypal, rsgp, or by completing surveys in return for ingame rsgp, items, ranks etc. - Please do not PM me if you're not a professional person. Everything will be split between the owners.
Website - I want to make a website for the server. The website will have the following options - Registration, High Scores, Forum, Donations - but with the option to complete survey. We will not be using a subdomain (we'll be using a .com). We can choose a name at any time.
To sum it up we can - Get the server up and running as soon as possible, with 24/7 uptime as I have a vps. Create a website for the server with everything intergrated (Registration, High Scores, Forum, Donations - but with the option to complete surveys) Earn a lot of money for us both.
PM ME FOR MY SKYPE.

item.title: Searching for a partner || Linux VPS Ready || Make $$$
item.dc:creator: @PvPXile PvPXile
item.description:
@PvPXile wrote:

Not too sure about you as you seem money orientated, but I could work with you.

Skype Louis.RSW

Read full topic
